description:
Ever wanted to start your own patisserie? Well, now it's your chance! Running your own pastry shop has never been easier in this puzzle cozy game. Move, place, and stuff all the meringues, waffles, ice creams, lollipops, and mochi to fit inside each available space.

Key Features: 
- Over 90 sweet levels to master!
- 29 sweets and chocolates to box.
- Soundtrack as sweet as the candy served! 
- Beautifully drawn confectionaries.
- Friendly host to accompany you in your journey!

Many sweets in unique shapes and sizes that must fit somewhere. Pack the boxes almost like packing your customer orders, make sure they all fit! 

If something doesn't fit, you can start again and make sure all pieces fit in like a piece of an art. Each level delivers hours of entertainment as they test your skill and keep you focused.
